#summary This document explains how to create several types of framework components or plug-ins.

= General Concepts =

Our primary purpose is to create a testbed or framework for functional navigation.  Do you want to know how to create a component that will seamlessly integrate with this framework?  If so, then you have come to the right place.  Otherwise, maybe you want to [Download Components] created by others.
